description: Styles for the Sidebar component of the application, defining layout, colors, and responsive behavior.

classes.name: sidebar
classes.description: The main container class for the sidebar with layout, colors, and transition effects.

classes.name: sidebar__header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the sidebar including alignment and padding.

classes.name: sidebar__title
classes.description: Defines the styles for the title within the sidebar including font color, weight, and size.

classes.name: sidebar__list
classes.description: Styles for the list inside the sidebar, controlling its layout and spacing.

classes.name: sidebar__item
classes.description: Styles for individual items within the sidebar including hover and active states.

classes.name: sidebar__footer
classes.description: Styles for the footer of the sidebar including padding and text alignment.
